column4: does anyone else use Empathy (the default chat program) or just me?
I am having a few issues here... what version do you have installed ?
I will check my other machine to see if its the same... but I dont recall this bug I have... thanks...
is it up to date? cause mine has 2.32.1 on it
I think so. Synaptic says that my version 2.30.3-0ubuntu1 is up-to-date.
I see the point, I have another repository here.... thanks.. sorry for the trouble
I made a mistake. '~$ lsb_release -a; Description: Ubuntu 10.04.2 LTS; Release: 10.04; Codename: lucid'. My apologies.
so you no what version and what build you have installed
As I told you I am using Empathy 2.30.3 on my Lucid computer.
